steps: Preheat oven to 425°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or spray with cooking spray
Use kitchen scissors to cut salmon into 2-inch squares (about 1-inch thick)
Set up three shallow bowls: one with flour, one with beaten eggs, and one with panko (mixed with salt and any optional seasonings)
Coat each salmon piece: dip in flour (shake off excess), then egg (let excess drip), then panko (press gently to adhere). Place on prepared baking sheet
Bake for 12-14 minutes until lightly golden and cooked through (internal temperature 145°F)
Serve immediately with lemon wedges, ketchup, tartar sauce, or your favorite dipping sauce
title: Salmon Nuggets
